pages.text: Through the use of the Brain, you've managed to recreate a Zombie Servant to have the ability to farm crops! When set to Wandering, these Zombies will find the nearest fully grown crop, and will harvest, gather and plant it.

When harvesting crops, the Hoe they're holding will start to break. While they can still gather and crops/seeds dropped on the ground, they can not longer plant or harvest crops without a Hoe. Fortunately the summoner can simply provide them a new Hoe by right clicking on them with one.

If the summoner right clicks on them, while crouching, the Zombie will drop all of its seeds/crops onto them. Despite being remade into a Farmer, they will still attempt to attack any hostile creatures near them, and they will not accept any weapons/tools other than hoes.
